item.title: ‘AI Detective’ Flags Brain Lesions in Children With Epilepsy
item.description: An AI tool can detect tiny brain lesions causing drug-resistant epilepsy in children with up to 94% accuracy, potentially improving diagnosis rates. M...

item.title: Are There Fewer SMuRF-less CVD Patients Than We Thought?
item.description: Almost all patients have at least one nonoptimal traditional risk factor before first cardiac event. Medscape Medical News

item.title: New Type of Glucose Sensor to Enter US Market
item.description: The Biolinq Shine wearable displays color-coded glucose values and adds other metrics via an app. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Antiplatelet Plus OAC Lowers Stroke, Raises Bleeding Risk

item.title: Measles Cases Surge in Australia
item.description: Experts say Australia’s falling vaccination rate has created a perfect storm for the spread of the disease. Medscape Medical News
